body_html: Hi @trypag , there is no need to compute 1-dice_val, instead I just multiply the dice_val by -1. We do that since we want to maximize the dice, and the optimizers trie to minimize the function. I haven't checked your code (I will do it later) but you would probably want to multiply by -1.
body_text: Hi @trypag , there is no need to compute 1-dice_val, instead I just multiply the dice_val by -1. We do that since we want to maximize the dice, and the optimizers trie to minimize the function. I haven't checked your code (I will do it later) but you would probably want to multiply by -1.
body: Hi @trypag , there is no need to compute `1-dice_val`, instead I just multiply the `dice_val` by -1. We do that since we want to maximize the dice, and the optimizers trie to minimize the function. I haven't checked your code (I will do it later) but you would probably want to multiply by -1.
